what.lead: Ensure European excellence in the future by doubling the spending on Research and Development to 4% of EU GDP by 2025
what.text: Push countries to invest in innovation to master the environmental and social challenges of tomorrow.

by creating the EU High Level Artificial Intelligence Coordination Office to gather the best minds and businesses in the field, set up a European AI Initiative, and establish high ethical standards for AI.

what.lead: Make Artificial Intelligence available and accessible for everyone,
what.text: by increasing the European Investment Bank’s support for AI investments to at least €1 billion a year by 2020, and by setting up a centralised “AI-on-demandplatform” to provide a single access point to key AI resources in the EU.
